text: Aur yeh log jab aap kay pass ayen jo humari aayaton per eman rakhtay hain to (yun) keh dijiye kay tum per salamti hai tumharay rab ney meharbani farmana apney zimmay muqarrar ker liya hai kay jo shaks tum mein say bura kaam ker bethay jahalat say phir woh iss kay baad tauba ker ley aur islah rakhay to Allah (ki shaan hai kay woh) bari maghfirat kerney wala aur bari rehmat wala hai
